attributes.action: stop dangerous motorway lane swapping by encouraging drivers to stay in lane.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the USA drivers stay in lane unless they are due to leave the motorway. The traffic flows smoothly without the hiccups caused by lane swapping. They have had motorways before us and have learnt how to live with them. We should use their experience and follow suit.
